评论详情: I've used this dress for my last 2 costumes. It's a couple years old and still looks new. Fabric quality is good and even though the material is thin, I stay warm enough walking around trick r treating with my kids.

评论概述: Lovely Fabric but was missing ribbon
评论详情: We got this dress for a costume party and it fit quite welll, however it was missing the front ribbon which made it look a bit weird.
Super value!  Looked terrific & even came with the hoop skirt!

Don't like the cheap fabric but thats why its cheaper. I love the look. I get stuck in it a lot cuz of the zipper ending where I cant reach it so take heed & don't be alone when putting it on or off. It fits nicely though. Its hard to go into certain shops cuz of hoop so you might want to plan the day right to avoid awkward areas & seats.
Beautiful quality, fit great and very much what I wanted, the picturez do not do this dress justice.
Love it! Great quality. I bought this dress and used it for a "Día De Muertos" Contest. Won first place. 🥇 Highly recommend

评论概述: Not for the plus size ladies
评论详情: I ordered the size closest to my measurements knowing it might be snug. The waist was snug, but the top wasn't even close. It sucked because it looked like it would be fairly nice, but just not for my body type.

评论概述: Correct size, good fabric, poor zipper
评论详情: Fits perfectly - use the sizing chart! I’m 5’2” and 123lbs, and ordered 3X based on the chart. It was a perfect fit. My only complaint is that the zipper sticks around the waist seam, making it impossible to zip up yourself, and was even quite difficult for my husband to do for me. The quality is so nice that I may consider having a tailor re-do the zipper. Used for a Nadja costume and got hundreds of compliments over the several Halloween events we attended!

Wore this as a costume in a haunted cornmaze. Held up to corn, scaring, chasing, and all the dirt etc. I did have to stich the seams along the back due to the wear and tear of me chasing people in it. Lol Hoop skirt held up great too! Now...to find a way to clean it! 🤷‍♀️🤣 Would definitely recommend and would buy again!
It was better than I thought! The quality was good and the hoop skirt was a bonus!  The fit and length was just right I was a hit at the Bridgerton party!

This dress is nicer then I expected. I'm so bummed it didn't fit me. I wear a 2x but I have broad shoulders. The dress has a bit of stretch and ties on the sides to cinch in the waist. It also comes with a hoop skirt.

评论概述: Too big, too long, missing hoop
评论详情: Bought this based on the measurements listed and it was absolutely huge. 4 inches too wide at the waist, about 6 inches too long, and the sleeves are also ridiculously long. I could have modified all that, but it also was missing the hoop skirt, which was the whole reason I picked this one over others. Getting one from Scarlet Darkness instead.

评论概述: Looks great, fits great, feels great
评论详情: Well made, especially for the cost. Got lots of compliments. Fabric is comfy; not too cold or hot. Comes with a hoop skirt, which I was surprised about. Honestly good quality for what it is. Not sure how, but I plan to get more wear out of it.

So... got the dress, it fits as expected... but it came with NO hoop skirt and didn't have the bow on the front neck part... pretty upset I paid full price to only get part of my order... no time to return it and wait for another to be delivered. 😔

I purchased this in a 2x, it fit perfectly. The material was great and I steamed the dress prior to wearing. The only reason for the 4 stars is that the zipper kept getting stuck and felt as though it may need to be replaced. Other than that I got many compliments. I also added the sacred heart to my dress instead of the bow it came with.
Worn once. ONE TIME. Three seams fell apart. Has not been washed, worn for less than 5hr to a concert.  Don't waste $80, find another dress!!

评论概述: This is so much value for the price, amazing costume.
评论详情: This dress is practically a real dress, no one knew it wasn't a complete article, even me. If you are a perfectionist, you might want to tailor it to be perfectly fitted, but I had a fine time with exactly what came in the mail.  I had a Victorian lace collar and a corset of my own but at the end of the day, the belt that cam with it was more flattering and made me look less squat.  I am 5'7 and if I were taller I would have wanted a black wide slip under, as it was itnwas almost short, but I guess I was lucky and it hid my boots alright.I won the Most Original Costume as Catrina for Dio de los Muertos.Honestly the dress is sturdy, the zipper was perfect and really well constructed.  It came with and authentic but light and wieldy hoop skirt.  It was not lined but the satin it was made with is so solid, it did not need a lining and thank goodness for that, otherwise I would have overheated while dancing.  Overall, I feel as though I got an amazing deal.  It could have easily cost 5-8 times more from a company here in California, or I could have spent twice the price just to rent it, instead I own it for under $80 including tax.  There was absolutely no smell of anything, perfect to wear out of the package.  I ordered up so I could be sure of a good fit in time for Halloween and it was roomy but perfect with the belt to cinch the waste and the hoop skirt was the same, roomy as a large.  I have 31" waist, 43" hips, 38" bust and I could have easily fit a medium.  These are American or Western sizes and a large was very very roomy through the waist, shoulders and bust.  I wear a 10/12 and this probably could have fit a 16/18.  There is no stretch, it is made from a sturdy washable satin, and the dress interior is totally finished, very comfortable, what you would expect from clothing from Kohl's,  all the seams were finished and smooth.  It is completely functional, everything works as designed to work.This is a brilliant product and I recommend and will buy from the manufacturer again, no doubt. 10/10.
My wife got this for a Wicked Witch costume but didn’t use the hoop skirt. Turned out nice! A couple of loose threads, not super itchy. Fit nicely with the belt added.

I wore this for our character day at school. I actually kept it on all day. The dress is well made, the material is superb! No one could believe I got this from Amazon! I was Sarah Forbes Bonetta( I ordered the book from Amazon too oh and the head piece as well) I recommend this dress, it’s worth it!!

I don't ever really write reviews but this dress received so many compliments! Fit perfectly and quality was great for the price. Surprised to see some negative comments because i cant see anything negative about it! Seemed true to size and I think im going to get one in black too! Really love this dress!!!

This dress was awesome! Such nice quality. Perfect for Nadja. It was alot of fabric so I was a little hot at the convention, mostly the chest part as there’s not much room to breath, but not the skirt part that was very airy! I had a little fan with me, that helped. I got the 2X but I’m wondering if the XL would have been better, less fabric maybe? But all in all it was great we got so many compliments. And we met the actor who plays Nandor! He loved our costumes so I think if this dress is Nandor approved it’s an A+!!! ♥️🖤

This review is mixed… because the dress is great! Buuutttt, they didn’t send the hoop skirt that came with the dress so I feel a bit cheated. I had chosen this one specifically because it came with one and now have to go buy another one.  Make sure to read measurements because I needed to go “up” in sizing compared to my usual letter size.
I love the versatility of this dress, it also came with a hoop skirt. Fits perfect and is lightweight
This feels like it’s very well made and wears very well. It’s insanely comfortable I wish we could dress like this again every day.

I didn't even mean to buy this dress as a dupe for the one Taylor wears in the fortnight music video but when I put it on I realized how similar they were. Now I'm even more glad to have it! It's surprisingly comfortable and very cute.

评论概述: Excellent quality for a great price
评论详情: I love this dress so much! I bought it to wear as a Victorian ghost and again to a Victorian themed Thanksgiving event. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it’s better made than expected and feels like a real dress.  The laces on the side allow for a custom fit and the details are really nice, from the buttons to the ruffles. The hoop skirt gives it extra authenticity and flair. The material is perfect for what it is. It’s not a super high quality but doesn’t feel like a cheap costume.  As far as fit, I think it’s true to size. I’m 5’8”, 145lbs and typically wear a medium. The medium fits perfectly and the ties make it easier to get the best look for my shape.  I’m so excited to wear this! I’ll update this if anything changes but I highly recommend you give it a shot.
Fabulous dress! Great quality...

This dress took a little while to ship but once it did, it got to me fast. I tried it on for size today, I am 5’8” and about 155 lbs, small bust. This dress is pretty large on top and the arms but once the corset part is on it cinches the wait really nice and gives me a great shape. The hoop skirt is stretchy but a little tight around my waist and the Velcro is a little itchy but not too bad. Definitely need to wear some tights with this dress since the hoop skirt opens it up and create a breeze down there. It was a little spendy at $80 for a Halloween costume but I hope to get some wear out of it over the years. I’ll Update after Halloween if anything goes wrong with it, but I’m excited to wear it!

Im 5’7, 145 pound, and wear a 34-C bra, and I purchased a large. It fits just a bit loose but looks perfect with the belt on. Sizing down might have been too tight. But it’s well made and gorgeous and I am 100% happy with this dress. Oh, and the length hits just above my ankles. Im not sure I would want it longer though, dragging the ground would wear out the hem and shorten the life of the dress. I’ll be wearing this for many halloweens to come.

Beautifully made. But the size chart states a 22/24 can wear it, and i think not. Sadly I'll be returning and getting something else because it just doesn't fit. I'd say an 18/20 would wear the 2xl best.

Dress was more than what I thought even though it's alot shorter. I'm 5'6" and with heels I could see under the dress it doesn't fall to the floor but anyone shorter I know it will look great!! It's so good! It's good for dancing for sure!! Had alot of compliments on it and the corset piece lol wooooow! Must buy!
This dress is more beautiful in person fits perfectly

2 stars for the quality of the dress itself. Otherwise, the item I received was missing EVERYTHING that was supposed to be included (belt and hoop skirt) as well as the presumably attached neck bow shown in every picture. Zero quality control.
Really well made. Comes with the hoop skirt which makes the dress perfect. I normally wear size medium and it fits perfectly without being too tight.
It took me months to finally find the right dress this is it. It’s a tad big. I could have down sized but I’ll deal. Not thin at all. Very good materials. The hop skirt for under is great!!!

Looks great, good quality, gigantic! I'm 5'7" 160 lbs. I got a large, fits like XXL. I could have got a small. The waist belt does fit nicely and snugs in the dress at the waist. It will look great in the dark for Halloween.
I love this dress so much, I wear it at the haunt I work at as much as I can.
I want to get all of these dresses now that I know I can fit in them perfectly. So amazing!
This dress was sold as new but clearly had been worn. It was ripped in several places and missing the hoop and belt.
didn’t come with the petticoat, and the corset it comes with is cheap, but the dress is great gonna use it for a Rosie (Hazbin Hotel) cosplay

I was very pleased with this dress which became the “talk of the night “ in our social event. As an artist I put my own touch by wearing a fascinator and see through gloves and my husband as a designer complemented it with some white flowers and a laced belt to remark my waist We love the quality and elegance of this outfit. I definitely recommend it and the price is just about right Enjoy it 😀

Phenomenal dress. True to picture, well made; comfortable hoop skirt. The corset is elastic, making it flattering but comfortable. A little short (I was 6' in my boots); a friend is going to add another black ruffle for length. Very happy.
The dress arrived damaged and without the belt or hoop skirt!

It fit better than expected. I was hoping the fabric would be more of a matte finish and a little heavier. I was not expecting it to come with a hoop skirt which was a plus. Overall it is pretty well made!

The dress isn't made well hems out of bottom I have to repair it b4 wearing again. Some of the hems on the ruffles are coming off. I wore it for a total of 2.5 hours handing out tric or treat candy. Couldn't go to the ball because I had no cape.
Size chart is way off from actual size. Way too small. Very disappointing.

While the gown is beautiful and the material appears to be good quality the construction is very poor and just after one use it broke on both sleeves and half the hem came undone.  Had it been an inexpensive costume I wouldn't have minded but at this price point I find it unacceptable that I will have to have it fix just after one use if I want to wear it again.
Fast, flawless delivery to Austria. Dress meets my daughter's expectations and so she is all set for the next cosplay event.
Love the dress, quality not too bad.
Love the dress, but no hoop skirt was included for some reason. Noticed a few other people had this problem too, how do I contact the seller?
The outfit actually looks like the photos!! This is from my photoshoot with the dress :) extremely happy with it! Great quality and easy to put on and off!

This was such a pleasant surprise.  It fit so well. It was the right length and everything.  I got a lot of compliments wearing it this past weekend.  I might have to get another color of this outfit the material was nice,  I loved thst it and cheap looking

Runs extremely small. I wear a size small but had to try a large just for a good fit. The design looks great on line but in person there are some structural problems. Like the side ribbons are too hard to lace up and don't lay flat after putting on the dress. While dressing for performances this would be a real problem.

I love this gown SO much! I ordered a small and it is a bit big for me in the shoulders and arms. It was missing the belt from the package so I was super bummed about that. I did have one that I had from a previous costume that I utilized with it.
It's worth the money ! I'll have to have it hemed though. Materials were very nice. Maybe it would have been better in cotton or a blend  over all, I love it !!! Very comfortable

The dress had fabric that was unraveled/torn upon arrival. The petticoat was missing. There was also some plastic stuck to the dress. The arms were busted open and I was unable to wear this dress. I had an event and had to go to Party City to purchase a dress. Wish I could give a better rating.
This product came in a box. It’s smells like smoke and wet dog. It’s torn and moldy inside and out. This is disrespectful to the customer and to their business. I will never order from them again.
Very good quality! Got lots of complements! The belt gave me an hour glass figure
I absolutely loved it! Wish it had pockets would be my biggest complaint.
Used for a Halloween costume, the waist was a little high, but with a thick belt it was perfect!
B very pretty but purchased wrong size

评论概述: Great costume and fantastic customer service
评论详情: Love the dress and the fact that it all came as one package instead of having to buy a separate hoop skirt. I did have an issue and had to contact the seller and they were fantastic to work with. Issue was resolved quickly. I had purchased this for a Christmas show event and wore it for 4 days. The dress held up nicely and was very comfortable and had great elasticity, plus the zipper was long so I could zip it up by myself. The size was accurate as well. This was a period party so the style of the dress was perfect. Definitely recommend Graceart for any costumes you need. They have superb costumes and service.

The dress by itself (minus the bow, belt, hoop skirt, and petty coats) is ugly as all can be the zipper is a bit hard at times. Very comfortable for what I used it for.  Definitely will use it in other costumes as well.

The dress is nicer quality than most Halloween costumes but not quite as nice as a real dress. The size chart was great and it even fit my wide shoulders. Great for dressing as Nadja from What we do in the Shadows!
So impressed with the quality of this dress! Came with hoop skirt, corset and bow. I'll be wearing it for Halloween for years to come.
This dress completely exceeded my expectations. It’s a great, thick fabric. Very well made, and very beautiful. I felt fantastic in it!

评论概述: Beautiful Victorian Ball Gown! Unbelievable for the price.
评论详情: The Ball Gown is beautifully made. Excellent quality. Hard to believe its a Halloween costume.

This was almost perfect for my Nadja costume for Halloween. I’m 5’9”, though, and the dress was really short. And it comes with a bright white hoop skirt that shows if you don’t wear it right under your bra. I ended up buying a black hoop skirt to make the dress appear longer which you can kind of see in the picture. Otherwise, it’s a great quality dress and looked exactly like what I was going for. It was even pretty comfortable to wear!
Only had on for an hour and it was unraveling looked nice but save your money
Beautiful dress plus good quality.

First of all, this costume looks fantastic right out of the bag. It has everything you need, including the belt and a (foldable!) hoop skirt. Add some accessories and you have a banging great costume! It is also very comfy, lightweight, and long enough that I could wear sneakers underneath without ruining the look. I chose to add a long black bow to the neck instead of the short red bow that came with it. My only complaint is that the stitching on the hoop skirt is poor and has started to come undone. Nothing a needle and thread can't fix, but some better stitching or material there would have been nice. Also, if anyone knows how to re-fold the wire hoop skirt, please write it in your review! I can't figure out how to collapse it again lol.
Had to cancel order never got refund

评论概述: Size was right on dress was great but within an hour the hem started to unravel.
评论详情: Dress was awesome size  was true. Hem started to unravel within an hour.

Great outfit. Much better than any standard costume from those Halloween stores. Corset sides allow for a pretty high level of adjustment based on your specific size which was helpful. Hoop skirt is a must to really make this costume shine. Overall 10/10.

评论概述: Fit was good. Quality is poor.
评论详情: Pleased the dress fit reasonably well. As a Halloween costume, I did not have high expectations for quality. I did not expect the bottom of the dress to shred in less than an hour, constantly tripping me through my day. I would take the time to trim with scissors, and 10 minutes later, my ankles would be caught in string.

I bought this to wear to my local Comic Con happening in early 2024 and wore it to a Halloween party to try it out. I also got an excellent wig and did my makeup like Nadja but I still thought she might be too niche to be recognized. Several people knew immediately who I was supposed to be!  It was comfortable to wear the whole afternoon/evening, at the party and in the car on the way to and from. The hoop that comes with it is flexible so you don't look ridiculous when you sit down. I felt fine temperature-wise. It probably wouldn't be great in the middle of summer but can definitely be made warmer with layers beneath it if need be.  It's a bit large but I'd rather not risk splitting a seam. I can always have it tailored if I need to. All in all, I'm really happy with this dress!
I bought this for Halloween and paired it with a hooded cape and a plague doctor mask. It fit perfectly and is actually made better than I expected it to be. I was very happy with this dress!!

I purchased this dress for Halloween I was expecting cheap material. However I was amazed at the quality and how amazing it looked . I got soooo many compliments I ordered a 2xl.  I want to say that if you are a XL stick to ordering that size they are true to size in my opinion. It is not heavy material very comfortable and I didn’t get sweaty nor itchy wearing it.

This dress looked perfect for my Halloween costume this year, but sadly it ripped in FOUR different places. It was so poorly made, and for $95, I expected much higher quality. Very disappointed and had to return 😞

评论概述: The bottom of the dress frays!!
评论详情: Everyone loved the dress and I got a lot of compliments, the quality of the dress is great other than the bottom of the dress fraying in multiple places, I had to glue the bottom of the dress just so I’d have a full dress by the end of the night and not a curtain.

This was total epic for Halloween and my character of Lizzie Borden! Comfort was great. Came with hoop skirt which really made the dress “pop”. I usually wear large but reading the other reviews I ordered Medium, so glad I did! Fit perfect so order size down. Very comfortable to wear, I had it on for six hours and never was uncomfortable. Definitely recommend
The dress is everything I hoped for! The material is awesome and it feels great.

This dress is SO IMPRESSIVE!! I got a million compliments. People's jaws dropped when I walked into the party!! Everybody asked where I found this dress! It's really nice quality material. The wrinkles steamed out easily. The hoop skirt slip was an awesome touch. I ordered a medium even tho the product measurements said a small would fit me. I didn't have time to deal with something too small so I ordered the medium to be safe. It ended up being a bit large across the shoulders and plenty big around the waist. I'm 5'5" 135lbs. From previous reviews, it sounded like people didn't like how short it was and that the corset belt easily pulled it all in. All of that was true. It was def very roomy in the waist, but the almost too tight corset belt worked very well to cinch it all in by gathering it it the back. It was short, about 8 inches from the floor. I wore platform Doc Martens and it looked awesome. 10/10 this dress was well worth the money. I'm going to want to wear it every dang year!

This dress was worth the money. Well made, comfortable and came with a hoop skirt to give it the perfect poof. I love the bow at the neck and the belt for the waist stayed attached all night. Even through dancing. I received so many compliments. If you are thinking of buying it, don’t hesitate. It is a beautiful costume!

评论概述: Dress is high quality and fits great. Perfect Nadja costume.
评论详情: Great value for the money. I am 5'4 and wore flats with the hoop skirt and arm length was perfect. I recommend sizing up.

El vestido llegó con todos sus accesorios, zipper bien, costuras bien hechas, terminaciones de buena calidad. Cumple con las expectativas,  -Cinturón o fajilla de elástico con frente de vinipiel -Moño del cuello está bien hecho y bonito -Crinolina de buen ancho y buenas terminaciones, elástico ajustable en la cintura

评论概述: It's good but missing hoop skirt
评论详情: The quality of the dress is nice but the skirt hoop is missing? I'm not sure if it comes in separate packages or ? I just want to dress up nicely for the Halloween :,]

This dress is absolutely beautiful and definitely exceeded my expectations ! It’s beautiful, the dress flows wonderfully and everything had been up in quality. The only flaw, which I don’t know if I had simply overlooked it or my suspicions are confirmed since it isn’t an issue with others I’ve seen, is that it was missing the neck piece bow that was supposed to come with it. I am unaware of how this could have occurred, or if maybe I had lost it when unpacking it, but I am unable to find it anywhere it the closed space I had opened it. Other than this loss product, I absolutely adore this dress and would recommend it to anyone interested!

I got this dress to wear for our local cemetery’s lantern tours. The fabric is nice and heavy and the hoop skirt really elevates it. As some other reviewers have stated, it is too short once you add the hoopskirt (I’m 5’3” and ordered a small) so I added an extra ruffle to the bottom. Also the dress is a bit roomy up top but once you add the belt, it cinches it nicely. I used a different belt and used a cameo pin instead of the bow, and added a top hat. It looked great and was fun to wear!
Missing petticoat and adjustable waistbelt

Wow. The weight of this dress. I mean it’s not cheap so it shouldn’t be crap but it’s a costume so…. wrong. It’s waaaay better in person even. I got it for a Nadja costume and it’s perfect. I’m 5’8” 165lbs and the XL fits exactly right. Highly Recommend!!
Halloween costumes have come a long way!  This is really pretty. The corset makes it tight in the middle so your waist looks great. Love the fit and it’s comfortable. Beautiful gown!
The dress is beautiful, well made and fits perfectly!! I couldn’t be more pleased!

Bought this in a large for my Nadja costume and imagine my infinite surprise when it fits perfectly and I am 5'1" 170lbs curvy build. That is not to discourage anyone from getting it that is taller, it will work fine with a tulle skirt but I did NOT have to get it altered or wear 6" heels. This is the first time I've gotten a costume that didn't require that and I am someone who decorates their home with their unique costume theme each year - I have a closet of costumes and this one is amazing! It is universal in design and can be used in so many capacities. Highly recommend and will be buying from this store again.

I was so excited to order this because of the overall positive reviews, but looking back, I'm noticing the compliments were for everything except the 2X. The bust squished down my chest uncomfortably, and the zipper wouldn't close. I loved the costume quality and was looking forward to wearing this, but it was just too small. I'm a US Size 18/20, so I thought according to the size chart this would be fine, but it didn't work out.

This dress is okay BUT it wasn’t delivered with all the pieces originally and not great quality. I don’t want to deal with it anymore, if you order do it way ahead of time because it might be missing something.

I’m 5’6 and 149lbs, size 34D, waist 29-30inches. It’s too big around the waist. Good thing is that I can wear a corset, it also has ribbons on the side of the waist to pull it in. Good material, no smell
material feels very cheap and looks nothing like the picture. flimsy and feels like something i'd get at spirit halloween.
My order did not include a hoop skirt. How can i get a refund for this?
Great great quality! Comes with underskirt as well! So happy with this purchase! Thick material and comfortable to wear. Will make a great outfit for my renaissance costume !
